predicate.note: Frames file for 'reap' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class remove-10.1, other framed members include draw, withdraw. Comparison to 'obtain'.

example.name: no received-from
example.text: The real battle is over who *trace* will control that market and reap its huge rewards.

example.name: with received-from
example.text: In a prepared statement, GM suggested its plans for Jaguar would be more valuable in the long run than the initial windfalls *trace* investors might reap *trace* from a hostile Ford bid.
